name.ja: Aerys - タブマネージャー

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open too many tabs in your browser? Don't worry, let Aerys II Targaryen, also known as the Mad King, help you burn them all!
short.zh_CN: 总是打开太多标签页？快来用Aerys帮你归类和整理标签！
short.zh_TW: 總是打開太多標簽頁？快來用Aerys幫你歸類和整理標簽！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Aerys will sort tabs by websites and give you a clear view of all open tabs. You can
- Search all opened tabs by title or url
- Click to jump to page.
- Close tabs with 1-click.
- Drag and drop to change order.
- Show recently closed tabs.
- Reopen recently closed tabs

Your can open the extension with a keyboard shortcut:
Windows – Control + Shift + K
Mac – Command + Shift + K
(If it's not working, go to chrome://extensions/shortcuts  and set your on shortcuts)

---Setting in Options---
- Disable show number of tabs on icon.
- Disable show recently closed tab.
- Enable Realign tabs together by class when clicked in popup

---Update 1.7.0---
Optimize search function and bug fixed.

*** Require Chrome 52 or higher ***

--- Privacy assurance ---
Information about your tabs are never transmitted or disclosed to either the developer or any other party.
long.de,ja:
- Clear view of all open tabs.
- Sort tabs by website
- Click to jump to page.
- Close tabs with 1-click.
- Drag and drop to change order.
- Show recently closed tabs.
- Reopen recently closed tabs

---Setting in Options---
- Disable show number of tabs on icon.
- Disable show recently closed tab.
- Enable Realign tabs together by class when clicked in popup

---Update 1.5.23---
Bug fix

*** Require Chrome 52 or higher ***

--- Privacy assurance ---
Information about your tabs are never transmitted or disclosed to either the developer or any other party.
long.zh_CN:
- 直接输入搜索标签页
- 分类显示现有标签页
- 点击跳转，方便查找
- 分类关闭，快速清理
- 拖动改变顺序，方便在窗口之间移动标签页
- 显示最近关闭的标签页，点击重新开启

--- 快捷键打开 --- 
- Windows – Control + Shift + K
- Mac – Command + Shift + K
（如需修改，可在地址栏输入 chrome://extensions/shortcuts 进行修改）

--- 个性设置 （ 右键图标 - 选项 ） ---
- 隐藏标签页数量的标记
- 可以禁用显示最近关闭的标签页
- 点击分组时，汇聚排列同组标签页 (默认关闭)
- 会自动按照网站组合分类标签，可在选项中禁用此功能

---Update 1.7.0---
直接输入即可搜索标题或地址，Bug Fixed


*** 需要 Chrome 52 或更高版本 ***

--- 隐私保证 ---
关于您标签页的信息绝不会发送或透露开发人员或任何其他方。

奇妙能力实验室出品 http://spacetech.design/
long.zh_TW:
- 分類顯示現有標簽頁
- 點擊跳轉，方便查找
- 分類關閉，快速清理
- 拖動改變順序，方便在窗口之間移動標簽頁
- 顯示最近關閉的標簽頁，點擊重新開啟

--- 個性設置 （ 右鍵 - 選項 ） ---
- 隱藏標簽頁數量的標記
- 可以禁用顯示最近關閉的標簽頁
- 點擊分組時，匯聚排列同組標簽頁 (默認關閉)

快捷鍵打開:
Windows – Control + Shift + K
Mac – Command + Shift + K
（如需修改，擴展程序頁面右下角點 鍵盤快捷鍵 修改）

---Update 1.5.23---
Bug fix

*** 需要 Chrome 52 或更高版本 ***

--- 隱私保證 ---
關於您分頁的資訊絕不會傳送或透露開發人員或任何其他方。
